com.clarionmedia.infinitum.event.impl

Class LifecycleEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.event.AbstractEvent
      • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.event.impl.LifecycleEvent

  • public class LifecycleEvent
extends AbstractEvent

    Concrete implementation of AbstractEvent signifying an event triggered during an Activity or Fragment lifecycle hook.
